titles.title: Congratulating Mr. Kermit Cintron on the successful defense of his IBF welterweight title on Saturday, 14, 2007, and for his continued success in and out of the ring.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/26/2007--Introduced. Congratulates Kermit Cintron, IBF welterweight champion, for his accomplishment. Thanks him for being a role model and an inspiration.
